titles.title: Maritime Lien Reform Act of 2013
A bill to provide limitations on maritime liens on fishing licenses and for other purposes.
Maritime Lien Reform Act of 2013

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Maritime Lien Reform Act of 2013 - Bars specified federal shipping laws related to maritime liability from: (1) establishing maritime liens on state or federal fishing licenses (authorizing a person or use of a vessel to engage in fishing), and (2) authorizing civil actions to enforce maritime liens on such licenses.
Specifies that a "fishing license" is governed solely by the state or federal law under which it was issued and is not included in the whole or as an appurtenance or intangible of a vessel.
